name: Blanca Paloma
description: '''Blanca Paloma Ramos Baeza''' (born 9 June 1989), also known by her given name of '''Blanca Paloma''', is a Spanish singer, [[Scenic design|set designer]] and [[costume designer]]. She [[Spain in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023|represented Spain]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2023]] with the song "[[Eaea]]", finishing in 17th place.
